parameters.name: AlertSetting
parameters.description: The alert settings. Valid value: INHERITED, which indicates that the HBR client sends alert notifications by using the same method configured for the backup vault.

parameters.name: ClientInfo
parameters.description: The installation information of the HBR clients.

parameters.name: CrossAccountRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the Resource Access Management (RAM) role that is created within the source Alibaba Cloud account and assigned to the current Alibaba Cloud account to authorize the current Alibaba Cloud account to back up data across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: CrossAccountType
parameters.description:
The backup type. Valid values:

- **SELF_ACCOUNT**: Data is backed up within the same Alibaba Cloud account.
- **CROSS_ACCOUNT**: Data is backed up across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: CrossAccountUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the source Alibaba Cloud account that authorizes the current Alibaba Cloud account to back up data across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: UseHttps
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to transmit data over HTTPS. Valid values:

*   true: transmits data over HTTPS.
*   false: transmits data over HTTP.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault.
